MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in CW12 postcode area of Congleton, affecting properties in Moreton. Astbury and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team have arrived on site and have managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to grounded overhead lines, and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:12AM on 9th November 2020
